name: Voy Finance
description: We create ESG, financial and supply-chain solutions that accompany companies, businesses, people, and the planet. Because we understand that without a planet, there is nothing to trade. We digitise banking trade finance and combine to the growing world of defi pools in a market that has a lack of real world assets to lend to enabling a real return on defi lending. Sustainable defi to RWAs connecting to banks and global trade.
